ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Cid}
“Hey, it's mine now!
An' I'll make good use of it,
believe-you-me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Cid}
“Hey thanks.
It'll help, pops!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Cid}
“Wh, wh-huh…?
I don't know nuthin' about that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “I gotta feelin' something bad's gonna happen.
Is everything gonna be okay?”{PAUSE}“I'm all right.
I've lived a long, full life.”{PAUSE}“But I'm worried about my son and his family
living in that far-off town…”{PAUSE}“I hope they're safe…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “Heh, heh. What an oddball.
We'll let him use it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “What the hell happened to that
rotten old elixir
I was gonna throw out?”{PAUSE}“If someone took that by mistake
it'll do more than make them sick…”{PAUSE}“Well, if you don't know
then I guess you don't know.”

ops.raw: d0 1a 00 05 ff 00 00 b6 ff ff fe 00 00

ops.description: showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Wait a minute.”{PAUSE}“Did you just take something?”

dialogStrings:
“I gotta feelin' something bad's gonna happen.
Is everything gonna be okay?”{PAUSE}“I'm all right.
I've lived a long, full life.”{PAUSE}“But I'm worried about my son and his family
living in that far-off town…”{PAUSE}“I hope they're safe…”
“Wait a minute.”{PAUSE}“Did you just take something?”

{Cid}
“Uh, oh. I'm…”
{CHOICE}Yeah, I took it, old man!
{CHOICE}I know nothin' about it!

{Cid}
“Hey, it's mine now!
An' I'll make good use of it,
believe-you-me!”

“Heh, heh. What an oddball.
We'll let him use it.”

{Cid}
“Wh, wh-huh…?
I don't know nuthin' about that.”

“What the hell happened to that
rotten old elixir
I was gonna throw out?”{PAUSE}“If someone took that by mistake
it'll do more than make them sick…”{PAUSE}“Well, if you don't know
then I guess you don't know.”
